extends java.lang.Object
    Java API for creating AlarmKey instances

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create(AlarmModel a)
        Creates an alarm key from the information in the model
        Parameters:
        a - the alarm model
        Returns:
        the alarm key

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> subsystemOpt,
                              java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> componentOpt,
                              java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> nameOpt)
        Creates an alarm key from the given optional subsystem, component and name, using wildcards in place of None. The key may match multiple alarms if any of the arguments are empty or contain Redis wildcards.
        Parameters:
        subsystemOpt - optional subsystem (default: any)
        componentOpt - optional component (default: any)
        nameOpt - optional alarm name (default: any)
        Returns:
        the alarm key

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> subsystemOpt,
                              java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> componentOpt)
        Creates an alarm key from the given optional subsystem and component, using wildcards for the alarm name. The key may match multiple alarms if any of the arguments are empty or contain Redis wildcards.
        Parameters:
        subsystemOpt - optional subsystem (default: any)
        componentOpt - optional component (default: any)
        Returns:
        the alarm key

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> subsystemOpt)
        Creates an alarm key from the given optional subsystem, using wildcards for the component and name. The key may match multiple alarms if any of the arguments are empty or contain Redis wildcards.
        Parameters:
        subsystemOpt - optional subsystem (default: any)
        Returns:
        the alarm key

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create()
        Creates an alarm key using wildcards for the subsystem, component and name. This key will match all alarms.
        Returns:
        the alarm key

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create(java.lang.String key)
        Creates an AlarmKey from the string representation.
        Parameters:
        key - one of the string values for key (key,severityKey, stateKey)
        Returns:
        the AlarmKey instance

      • create

        public static AlarmKey create(java.lang.String subsystem,
                              java.lang.String component,
                              java.lang.String name)
        Creates an AlarmKey for the given subsystem, component and alarm name
        Parameters:
        subsystem - the subsystem for the component
        component - the component for the alarm
        name - the alarm name
        Returns:
        the AlarmKey instance
